meta: I was very sick when my first daughter was born.  My sister came and stayed for two weeks to help us out.
dialogue: I was very sick when our first daughter was born. I developed HELLP syndrome with her and was in the hospital for 7 days.
Oh, that's terrible!! What is HELLP syndrome?

It's basically when eclampsia progresses to the point that your blood doesn't clot and your organs start shutting down.  I had to stay 7 days past her birth to get my blood to start clotting again.  My sister came down and stayed for 2 weeks to help us out.
Thank goodness she was able to come, but that must have been so scary! I hope you're okay now!

meta: I had surgery a few weeks ago, and my friends all brought me casseroles so that I wouldn't have to make dinner as I healed.
dialogue: I had surgery a few weeks ago. It was tough, but my friends really helped out.

My knee. But what's important is that my friends brought over dinner for a week so I wouldn't have to cook. They're really wonderful and I'm very lucky to have them as friends.
That's really nice! I hope you recover really quick!
Oh my, what did you have surgery for?
My knee. But what's important is that my friends brought over dinner for a week so I wouldn't have to cook. They're really wonderful and I'm very lucky to have them as friends.
